questionListItems.title: How do I contact my child's teachers?

answer.body: You may contact your child's teachers at 6795 7381 (General Office) during school hours.  Alternatively, you may email them or message them through the Class Dojo platform.

questionListItems.title: How to I check whether my child's calculator or Mother Tongue dictionary is an approved model for use during PSLE?

answer.body:
For the list of approved calculators, please visit https://www.seab.gov.sg/home/examinations/approved-calculators

For the list of approved dictionaries, please visit https://www.seab.gov.sg/home/examinations/approved-dictionaries

questionListItems.title: What is the recess timing and snack time?

answer.body:
You may refer to the following link for our snack time and recess timings:

https://www.corporationpri.moe.edu.sg/for-parents/schoolhoursandbreaktimes/

questionListItems.title: How do I apply for financial assistance?

answer.body: You may approach our general office staff for guidance on how to apply for financial assistance. You can also refer to the following link for more information on the eligibility criteria: https://www.moe.gov.sg/financial-matters/financial-assistance

questionListItems.title: Is it compulsory for all students to have a CCA?

answer.body: CCA form an integral part of the school's objective to provide an all-round education for our pupils. As such, every pupil from P3 onwards is required to participate in one CCA during his/her primary school years. CCA has been built into the curriculum time to ensure that all P3 to P6 pupils participate in one CCA. All CCA are conducted on Tuesdays from 2.45pm to 4.45pm.

questionListItems.title: What are the school curriculum hours?

answer.body:
You may refer to the following link for our school curriculum hours:

https://www.corporationpri.moe.edu.sg/for-parents/schoolhoursandbreaktimes/

questionListItems.title: Does the provide after school care service

answer.body:
The after school care service provider in our school is Nascans Pte Ltd. For more information about the after school care service in our school, you may refer to the following links:

  • https://www.corporationpri.moe.edu.sg/for-parents/generalinformation/

  • https://www.nascans.com/contact-us-school-based/

questionListItems.title: What kind of CCA does CPS provide?

answer.body:
CPS offers a wide range of CCAs. You may refer to the following link for the list of CCAs offered in CPS:

https://www.corporationpri.moe.edu.sg/departments/cca/
